WET Rebate round 4 â€“ a new, somewhat fairer dealÂ released https://t.co/EvEPosufLv https://t.co/fLFDeoj7iI
@frozensummers volumetric is the answer!
@ruminski not necessarily. As long as you buy the fruit and then sell it under your own label you're covered. Bulk wine not eligible though.
Still, would be even cleaner if we ditch WET altogether. It's an inefficient tax that doesn't help premium wine (IMO). 3/3
I'm sure there will be loopholes exploited in this new WET rebate arrangement, but at least small producers 'back in'... 2/3
This WET update is much better. Covers off growers, small producers who make wine from bought fruit and most legitimate producers... 1/3
In other words, as long as you buy/own the grapes and then make it into wine you sell (as a producer) you're ok https://t.co/bXnsE5pzxg
